definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: The second chapter is "Late-Tang-Dynasty Poetic Form and Constitution of its Poetry Image".
sentences.chinese: 第二章“晚唐体与晚唐体诗歌意象的构成”。

sentences.english: Then, it discusses the typification of the image of stone.
sentences.chinese: 最后进行石头意象经典化的讨论。

sentences.english: The sound of the lute is soaring and majestic like Mount Tai.
sentences.chinese: 琴声中表达出来的意象象高峻雄伟得像泰山一样。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is "Artistic Conception of Image Combination of Poetry in Late-Tang-Dynasty Poetic Form".
sentences.chinese: 第四章“晚唐体诗歌意象组合的审美境界”。

sentences.english: The white, has high-level and the technical image.
sentences.chinese: 白色，有高级和科技的意象。

sentences.english: The Chinese parasol image contains plentiful love meanings in Tang Poetry.
sentences.chinese: 唐诗中梧桐意象蕴含着丰富的爱情意义。

sentences.english: On image, CCP emphasizes abstractness while English verse tries to depict the real world.
sentences.chinese: 从意象上讲，汉诗强调抽象而英诗注重写实。

sentences.english: Xiaoxiang is one of the numerous images in Qu Yuan's Lisao.
sentences.chinese: 屈骚中有众多的意象，而“潇湘”意象便为其中之一。

sentences.english: Xiaoxiang is one of the numerous images in Qu Yuan's Lisao.
sentences.chinese: 屈骚中有众多的意象，而“潇湘”意象便为其中之一。

sentences.english: Dickinson introduced Gothic to her poetry and applied many images of ghosts and goblins.
sentences.chinese: 狄金森将哥特体引入诗歌，使用了很多鬼怪类的意象。

sentences.english: The double images of the eagle deeply reflect the internal contradiction of Du Fu's character.
sentences.chinese: 雕意象的二重性深刻地体现了杜甫人格的内在矛盾。

sentences.english: Imagist poetry exists in both American and Chinese history of literature.
sentences.chinese: 意象诗是美中两国诗歌史上一个十分相近的诗歌现象。

sentences.english: Thus in the poems for the paintings, the images of wild goose are many often relate with the sentiment of living abroad and homesickness.
sentences.chinese: 表现在题画诗中，雁意象多与羁旅和思乡之情相联系。

sentences.english: In Jinyong s novels there are massive cave images.
sentences.chinese: 金庸小说中存在着大量的山洞意象。

sentences.english: So art exists in the continuous emergent process of Yi-xiang.
sentences.chinese: 艺术在意象的生成中存在。

sentences.english: This is what I call not having a specular image.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我所谓的没有自我理想的魅影意象。

definition: to use sth as a metaphor
